docs.title: Home

docs.text: Welcome to the documentation of Blood Magic.
docs.title: Blood Magic

docs.text:
Ritual of the Full Spring


Perhaps the simplest of rituals. This ritual grabs the moisture in the air and condenses it, forming a source block of water on top of the MRS. It will spawn a water source block every tick.


Structure


This rituals needs the following blocks:




1x Master Ritual Stone


4x Ritual Stone of Water




In this formation:




Cost


It costs 500LP to activate the ritual and 25LP per block created.
docs.title: Ritual of the Full Spring

docs.text:
Serenade of the Nether


This ritual is slightly more sinister than its cousin, The Serenade of the Nether draws lava from across dimensions and generates a source block of lava on top of the MRS.


Structure


This ritual needs the following blocks:




1x Master Ritual Stone


4x Ritual Stone of Fire




In this formation:




Cost


This ritual has an activation cost of 10,000LP and a refresh cost of 500LP per lava source block. This ritual can run your network dry if you use it too quickly.
docs.title: Serenade of the Nether

docs.text:
Ritual of the Green Grove


A ritual that is helpful for those stubborn plants that you need to grow quickly, the Green Grove force-grows plants by sending the plants in its range (3x3x1 horizontal pane two blocks above the MRS) a growth tick once a second. This can help you a steady supply of plants and crops.


Yes this also works on Sugarcane. (Or for modders: simply everything that is IGrowable or IPlantable)


Structure


This ritual needs the following blocks:




1x Master Ritual Stone


4x Ritual Stone of Water


4x Ritual Stone of Earth




In this formation:




Cost


This ritual has an activation cost of 5,000LP and each of these growth ticks costs 5LP per plant.
docs.title: Ritual of the Green Grove

docs.text:
Ritual of High Jump


This ritual looks for any living entity that is above the MRS and then shoots them into the air. If a person is pressing shift, the person will be able to land safely without being sent flying.


Structure


This ritual needs the following blocks:




1x Master Ritual Stone


6x Ritual Stone of Air




In this formation:




Cost


This ritual costs 5,000LP to activate and 5LP per operation.
